title: 16-year-old dies after Meadow Street shooting
content:
A 16-year-old is dead after a shooting less than a week before Thanksgiving Day.
Markevious K. Jackson, of Taggart Avenue, Greenwood, died Friday at Self Regional Medical Center from a gunshot wound, according to Greenwood County Coroner Sonny Cox. An autopsy is scheduled for Sunday.
The incident happened at 6:38 p.m. on Meadow Street.
One person was shot, according to Lt. Mike Dixon with the Greenwood Police Department, and officers are investigating. He was not immediately able to release additional information.
Nine police cars and two ambulances were at the scene, which was dotted with bystanders, before 7 p.m. A person on a stretcher was put into the back of an ambulance.
This is a developing story and will be updated.
